summary: Converts the Hooded Thalmor Robes, Boots and Gloves into an unenchanted Light Armor set.
descriptionHtml:
---Version 1.1---
Does the same as the original version, but makes each item upgradable.  Each item requires Void Salts(x1) to be improved.  Comments don\'t seem to be working, so please PM me with your comments/requests and any bugs discovered.

To do:
- Create a craftable version of the armor set.

---Version 1.0---
This mod does three things:
- It removes the default enchantment from the Hooded Thalmor Robes.
- It converts the Hooded Thalmor Robes, Thalmor Boots, and Thalmor Gloves from cloth to Light Armor.
- It then re-balances the armor, weight and value stats to mirror those of the Thieves\' Guild Master Armor set.  Note that since this is the hooded version of the Thalmor Robes, I have combined the stats of the Guild Master\'s Hood and Chestpiece for the Hooded Thalmor Robes.

This mod is for individuals who loved the look of the Hooded Thalmor Robe set, but wanted an unenchanted Light Armor version.  The armor can be found by killing any Thalmor agent or using the console codes for Hooded Thalmor Robes, Thalmor Boots, and Thalmor Gloves.  See the Skyrim Wiki for those codes.

Installation (Recommended):
Download via the Nexus Mod Manager.

Installation (Manual):
Move the .esp file into your default Skyrim data folder. The filepath will most likely be C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim\\data. On the Skyrim launcher screen, under Data Files, make sure Thalmor Light Armor.esp is checked. Enjoy.

Bugs and Comments:
I\'ve found none so far. Please include a detailed description of any bugs encountered under the comments section. All comments are appreciated.
author: Capularis
